title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 593.1 - Background and intent
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 593.1 - Background and intent

State Regulations
(a) This Part
establishes standards for reimbursement under the medical assistance program
for community rehabilitation services provided by residential programs for
adults with mental illness and children and adolescents with serious emotional
disturbance. (b) This Part
establishes standards for service planning and review for programs receiving
reimbursement under the medical assistance program for the provision of
community rehabilitation services. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
593.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
